column4: anyone having issues with flash on ubuntu 9.04 maybe want to try downloading the latest version of flash, just unpack it to your /home/.mozilla/plugins folder, then just reset all of your sounds to default and restart the pc
when you go to play a flash video firefox should ask you if you want to install flash... you don't need to download/ unpack and install manually
there are no 64-bit versions offered there
the upgrade breaks flash for most 64-bit users who had ubuntu extras
